snippet: Somalia’s president appointed a new prime minister on Wednesday, naming Omar Abdirashid Ali Sharmarke to succeed the prime minister ousted by Parliament this month
abstract: Omar Abdirashid Ali Sharmarke is named to succeed country's prime minister, ousted by Parliament in December.
lead_paragraph: Somalia’s president appointed a new prime minister on Wednesday, naming Omar Abdirashid Ali Sharmarke to succeed the prime minister ousted by Parliament this month
